thinking: I'll help you open the website and purchase melatonin gummies. Let me start by taking a screenshot to see the current state of the desktop, then open Firefox to navigate to the specified URL.
I can see the desktop with a taskbar at the bottom. I need to open Firefox to navigate to the shopping website. I can see the Firefox icon in the taskbar.
Great! Firefox has opened and I can see the main page with the address bar. I need to navigate to the shopping website URL. I'll click on the address bar and enter the URL.

Perfect! I can see the address bar is active and there's a dropdown with suggestions. I can also see that there's a suggestion for "jingyuhhh.github.io/Shopping/#/task/5/store/PaperPal?agent=true" which is very close to what I need. I'll type the exact URL that was requested.
Good! I've entered the URL in the address bar. Now I need to press Enter to navigate to the website.

Excellent! The shopping website has loaded successfully and I can see various melatonin gummy products available. I can see several options:

Carlyle Melatonin Gummies 10mg, 180 Count - $14.29
Vitamatic Melatonin 20mg Gummies for Adults, 30 Servings, 60 Count - $9.99
Olly Sleep Gummies, 3mg Melatonin, 120 Count - $28.89
Vitamatic Sugar Free Melatonin 60mg, 60 Vegetarian Gummies - $29.99
Nordic Naturals Zero Sugar Melatonin Gummies, Raspberry, 60 Count - $13.79
I'll select one of these melatonin gummies. Let me choose the Carlyle Melatonin Gummies as it's a good middle-priced option with a good count. I'll click "Add to cart" for that product.

Perfect! I can see the confirmation message "Added to cart successfully!" appeared at the top of the page, and I can also see that the shopping cart icon now shows "1" indicating that there's one item in the cart. Now I need to proceed to checkout. I'll click on the "Shopping Cart" button to view my cart and proceed with the purchase.

Excellent! I'm now in the shopping cart page. I can see:

Good! The phone field is now active. I'll enter the phone number:
Excellent! The phone number has been entered. Now I need to fill in the address field. Let me click on the Address field:
Perfect! The address field is now active. I'll enter the complete address:

Perfect! I can see all the information is filled out correctly, and there don't appear to be any additional payment fields required at this stage. The "Place your order" button is clearly visible and ready to be clicked. Let me proceed to place the order:

I can see there's an error message that appeared: "Please fill in all required fields and select a shipping method." I notice that while I can see the Standard shipping option appears to be available, I need to actually select it. Let me click on the Standard shipping radio button to select it:
Great! I can see the Standard shipping option is now selected (the radio button is filled in). The error message is still showing, so let me try clicking "Place your order" again to proceed:
